summary: A test suite that rigorously verifies the behavior of the Euler discrete diffusion scheduler under a variety of configurations, including custom sigma and timestep schedules, different devices, noise injection patterns, prediction types, and beta‑rescaling options.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the Euler diffusion scheduler implementation so that downstream machine‑learning pipelines can rely on accurate and stable diffusion steps during training and inference.
